sys_data_source.name: PS Source Data
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT
a.updated, a.acpid, ev.start_date, ev.end_date, s.sitename, s.phys_addr, s.phys_addr2, s.phys_city, s.phys_state, s.phys_zip, s.p_country, eval.firstname "eval_fname", eval.lastname "eval_lname", eval.email "eval_email", eval.eid "eval_eid", eval.oracleid "eval_oid", eval.middle "eval_mname", eval.persontitle, s.siteid, owner.eid "owner_eid", owner.firstname "owner_fname", owner.middle "owner_mname", owner.lastname "owner_lname", owner.email "owner_email", owner.oracleid "owner_oid", rmgr.eid "rmgr_eid", rmgr.firstname "rmgr_fname", rmgr.middle "rmgr_mname", rmgr.lastname "rmgr_lname", rmgr.email "rmgr_email", rmgr.oracleid "rmgr_oid", hrmgr.eid "hrmgr_eid", hrmgr.firstname "hrmgr_fname", hrmgr.middle "hrmgr_mname", hrmgr.lastname "hrmgr_lname", hrmgr.email "hrmgr_email", hrmgr.oracleid "hrmgr_oid", svcmgr.eid "smgr_eid", svcmgr.firstname "smgr_fname", svcmgr.middle "smgr_mname", svcmgr.lastname "smgr_lname", svcmgr.email "smgr_email", svcmgr.oracleid "smgr_oid", o.name, o.officeid, o.gsiregion, j.jid, j.jobpc, j.jobskill, jtprefix.prefix, jtpri.titlename, jtsec.titlename, jtsuffix.suffix, j.qcicraft, emp.eid "e_eid", emp.firstname "e_fname", emp.middle "e_mname", emp.lastname "e_lname", emp.email "e_email", emp.oracleid "e_oid" FROM job AS j, jtprefixlist AS jtprefix, jtprimarylist AS jtpri, jtsecondarylist AS jtsec, jtsuffixlist AS jtsuffix, acp AS a, `events` AS ev, officeinfo AS o, site AS s, entity AS emp, entity AS svcmgr, entity AS eval LEFT JOIN entity AS `owner` ON (eval.empowner = owner.eid) INNER JOIN entity AS hrmgr ON (eval.hrmanager = hrmgr.eid) INNER JOIN entity AS rmgr ON (eval.resourcemanager = rmgr.eid) WHERE j.siteid = s.siteid AND eval.homeoffice = o.officeid AND a.jobid=j.jid AND eval.eid = a.evaluatorid AND ev.rid = a.acpid AND ev.eid = emp.eid AND svcmgr.eid=j.owner AND j.jtprefixid = jtprefix.prefixid AND j.jtprimaryid = jtpri.primaryid AND j.jtsecondaryid = jtsec.secondaryid AND j.jtsuffixid = jtsuffix.suffixid AND ev.end_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 16 WEEK)
